mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_restaurant (nm, addr, lat, lng, cd_category, i_user, r_dt, m_dt) VALUES (#{nm}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lng}, 1, #{i_user}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT A.nm, A.addr, A.i_user, A.hits as cntHits , B.val AS cd_category_nm, ifnull(C.cnt, 0) AS cntFavorite FROM t_restaurant A LEFT JOIN c_code_d B ON A.cd_category = B.cd AND B.i_m = 1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT i_rest, COUNT(i_rest) AS cnt FROM t_restaurant_recommend_menu WHERE i_rest = #{i_rest} GROUP BY i_rest ) C ON A.i_rest = C.i_rest WHERE A.i_rest = #{i_rest}
